short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collection of useful tools to elevate developer experience with Azure DevOps tickets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collection of useful tools to elevate developer experience with Azure DevOps tickets. Includes: Button to copy a branch name according to ticket title. Button to copy commit message according to ticket title. Button that helps you to quickly add child tickets for UI, API and Testing.
